subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. suspended Boston Celtics guard Ray Allen one game without pay for elbowing Cleveland Cavaliers forward Anderson Varejao in the groin. Allen will be docked more than $167,000 in salary.
snippet: The N.B.A. suspended Boston Celtics guard Ray Allen one game without pay for elbowing Cleveland Cavaliers forward Anderson Varejao in the groin. Allen will be docked more than $167,000 in salary.
